plot
A lethal virus spreads throughout the British isles,infecting millions 
and killing hundreds of thousands. To contain the threat, acting 
authorities brutally quarantine the country as it succumbs to fear and 
chaos. The quarantine is successful. Three decades later, the Reaper 
virus violently resurfaces in a major city. An elite group of specialists, 
including Eden Sinclair, is urgently dispatched into the still-quarantined 
country to retrieve a cure by any means necessary. Shut off from the 
rest of the world, the unit must battle through a landscape 
that has become a waking nightmare.
